sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"请求，恳求"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: plead, appeal, beg, petition, entreat, pray
means: plead ： 指谦卑而又不失尊严地请求，侧重迫切感。
appeal ： 常指以道义原则为基础或以法律为依据的请求。
beg比plead通俗，不用于法律范畴，指低声下气地请求，有时含贬义，指某人喋喋不休地要求得到帮助。
petition ： 指正式而热切地请愿或祈求。
entreat的意义与beg的大致相同，但较文雅。
pray ： 指祈求，多用于宗教用语中。

sentence.Network_en: His lawyers filed a petition for all charges to be dropped.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的律师提请撤销所有指控。

sentence.Network_en: Public employees, teachers and liberals are circulating a petition for his recall.
sentence.Network_cn: 公务员、教师和自由派人士正在散发请愿书,要求将他召回.

sentence.Network_en: We recently presented the government with a petition signed by 4,500 people.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近我们向政府递交了有4,500人签名的请愿书。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin petitio(n-), from petit- 'aimed at, sought, laid claim to', from the verb petere

entry.def: A petition is a document signed by a lot of people which asks a government or other official group to do a particular thing.

example.ex: We recently presented the government with a petition signed by 4,500 people.
example.tran: 最近我们向政府递交了有4,500人签名的请愿书。

entry.def: A petition is a formal request made to a court of law for some legal action to be taken.

example.ex: His lawyers filed a petition for all charges to be dropped...
example.tran: 他的律师提请撤销所有指控。
法庭驳回了他们的上诉。

entry.def: If you petition someone in authority, you make a formal request to them.

example.ex: All the attempts to petition the Congress had failed...
example.tran: 所有向国会请愿的努力均告失败。

means.word_mean: 1. a formal message requesting something that is submitted to an authority
1. write a petition for something to somebody; request formally and in writing

auth_sentence.content: I doubt you will get anywhere with that petition.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I doubt you will get anywhere with that petition.

stems_affixes.word_buile: centri=centr中心+pet追+al……的→追求中心的→向心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有能力的,能胜任的;足够的
竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compete[v.比赛,竞争]+itive……的→adj.竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
per全部永久+pet追求,寻求+ual……的→追求永久的
pet追求,寻求+ulant多……的→追求太多,导致脾气不好
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ous……的→在[别人]前面追到→幸运的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 食欲,胃口;欲望,性欲;爱好,趣味
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+pet追求,寻求+ite表名词→一再追求→有胃口
appet=appetite胃口+izer东西→n.开胃食品,开胃物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能力,胜任某种工作的资格
stems_affixes.word_buile: competent[[adj.有能力的,能胜任的;足够的]]省鷑.能力,胜任某种工作的资格
compete[v.比赛,竞争]+ition表名词→n.竞争, 竞赛
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
petition[n.请愿书,申请书 v.[向…]请愿,正式请求]+er人→n.请愿人
per全部,永久+pet追求,寻求+uate=ate表动词→追求永久
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ate表动词→追到前面去→获宠爱

means.word_mean: (许多人签名的向当权者提出某种要求的)请愿书

sentences.en: Everyone signed the petition to the County Council for a new school in our village.
sentences.cn: 大家在致县委会的请愿书上签了名, 要求在我们村里办一所新学校。

sentences.en: Local residents have successfully petitioned against the siting of a prison in their area.
sentences.cn: 当地居民反对在区内兴建监狱的请愿获得了成功。

sentences.en: The group intends to petition Parliament for reform of the law.
sentences.cn: 这个团体准备请求谇修改法律。

sentences.en: Parents petitioned the school to review its admission policy.
sentences.cn: 家长请愿恳求学校修订招生政策。

jushi.english: The people petitioned to be allowed to return to their island.
jushi.chinese: 这些人提出请愿,请求允许他们回到自己的岛上。

jushi.english: They petitioned that the case should be retried.
